idea-plugin.change-notes:
• Version 1.0rc4
    • scheme: CSS support
    • theme: small tweaks and fixes
  • Version 1.0rc3
    • plugin: glorious new logo!
    • colors: slightly desaturate tints
    • scheme: support C/C++
    • scheme: support Bash
    • scheme: support Typescript
    • theme: fix various defects: notifications, new buttons
  • Version 1.0rc1 -- 1.0 preview!
    • theme: implement some omitted style keys
    • theme: differentiate some more elements for contrast and clarity
  • Version 0.12 -- palette stabilization and theme polish
    • theme: improve object and action colors
    • scheme: continued color adjustment
    • palette: add dedicated palettes for objects and actions
  • Version 0.11 -- palette fixes
    • palette: remove broken ab offset to get proper temperature color shift
    • palette: deepen and saturate primary color collection
    • scheme: add javascript styling
    • scheme: color balancing progress, not final yet
  • Version 0.10 -- stabilization candidate for 1.0
    • theme: fixed contrast-less text fields, info boxes, etc.
    • theme: replaced the salmon color with more muted version
    • scheme: more muted literals
    • scheme: more visible documentation comments
    • scheme: disable all underlining
    • palette: richer highlight colors
    • palette: larger primary palette with TriHex solver
